roleset.name: natural disaster: mudslide

example.text: The object is to slow a 50 mph mudslide down to 5-10 mph to allow the sediment to settle.
...and sent a half-million-tonne mudslide of liquefied coal slurry down onto the village.

roleset.note: Added by Julia in a Natural Disaster roleset endeavor, comparison to avalanche, landslide, rockslide, lahar.
